column4: is there some repository name I can use in sources.list that points to the latest repository ? instead of using "feisty" or anything, something like "latest"
no. when there is a new version, update-manager will notify you of that.
it seems if i dont change apt-sources, update-manager doesnt tell me that
i haven't used it, but i just tested and it gets updates for my old version and doesnt notify about new ones
